item.title: GameStop 和 AMC 大涨，Meme 股票涨势延续至第三天
item.description: 周三，围绕高风险和严重做空公司的狂热情绪再度升温，推动 "记忆股 "宠儿 GameStop 公司和 AMC Entertainment Holdings 公司连续第三个交易日走高。【原文：The renewed frenzy surrounding high-risk and heavily shorted companies is propelling meme-stock favorites GameStop Corp. and AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. higher Wednesday for a third consecutive session.】

item.title: Rystad 预测今夏汽油需求将突破 2019 年水平
item.description: Rystad Energy A/S表示，尽管近期市场出现疲软迹象，但今年夏天全球汽油需求仍将保持强劲。【原文：Global gasoline demand will remain robust this summer despite recent signs of weakness in the market, according to Rystad Energy A/S, which expects consumption to top levels seen before the pandemic in 2019.】

item.title: 国际能源署称出口降至 5 个月低点，俄罗斯石油收入受到打击
item.description: 据国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）称，在乌克兰无人机袭击和减产计划的影响下，俄罗斯 4 月份的原油和石油产品出口量降至 2023 年底的水平，给该国的石油收入带来了压力。【原文：Russia’s April exports of crude and petroleum products dropped to levels last seen in late-2023 amid Ukrainian drone attacks and planned output cuts, putting pressure on the nation’s oil revenues, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 国际能源署称全球石油需求增长前景继续疲软
item.description: 国际能源机构表示，在经济放缓和欧洲温和天气的影响下，今年全球石油需求增长前景继续疲软。【原文：The outlook for global oil demand growth this year continues to soften amid an economic slowdown and mild weather in Europe, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 印尼下一任领导人的目标是实现高于世界水平的 8%增长
item.description: 当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托坚信，他将通过专注于工业化以及食品和能源安全，帮助印尼在任期初期赢得世界经济增长最快国家的称号。【原文：President-elect Prabowo Subianto is confident that he will be able to help Indonesia win the world’s fastest-growing economy tag early in his term, by focusing on industrialization and food and energy security.】

item.title: 在沙特阿拉伯开店的迪拜咨询公司对外国直接投资持乐观态度
item.description: 据精品公司 deNovo Corporate Advisors 称，沙特阿拉伯开始吸引更多外国直接投资以支持王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼的经济多元化努力只是时间问题。【原文：It’s only a matter of time before Saudi Arabia starts attracting more foreign direct investment to support Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s economic diversification drive, according to boutique firm deNovo Corporate Advisors.】

item.description: 私募股权基金向投资者返还利润的新方法可能会在印度受到欢迎。【原文：A new method for private equity funds to return profits to investors may gain traction in India.】

item.title: 高盛称韩国距离加入主要债券指数越来越近
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：South Korea will likely enter a key global bond index in September if it achieves a breakthrough in expanding foreign investors’ access to its government debt next month, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行极有可能在 6 月开始降息
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行很有可能在 6 月份举行的下一次政策会议上开始降息。【原文：The European Central Bank is very likely to start cutting interest rates at its next policy meeting in June, Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 由于对民调的担忧，2012 年以来外资看空印度股票的人数最多
item.description: 由于市场猜测印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的政党在正在举行的全国大选中赢得的席位将少于此前的预期，外国投资者对印度股市的看法是十多年来最悲观的。【原文：Foreign investors are the most pessimistic in over a decade on Indian stocks amid speculation over Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party winning fewer seats in the ongoing national elections than previously estimated.】

item.title: Avendus Wealth 聘用安信银行私人银行主管担任首席执行官
item.description: Avendus 集团任命资深私人银行家 Apurva Sahijwani 为其财富管理业务的新任首席执行官，以扩大对家族办公室和印度富人的服务。【原文：Avendus Group named veteran private banker Apurva Sahijwani as the new chief executive officer for its wealth management business as it expands services for family offices and India’s wealthy.】

item.title: 瑞典通胀支持瑞典央行减轻物价压力
item.description: 瑞典上个月的基本通胀率保持不变，这对瑞典央行来说是一个令人欣慰的迹象，上周，瑞典央行成为第二家降息的发达国家主要央行。【原文：Sweden’s underlying inflation remained unchanged last month in a vindicating sign for the Riksbank, which last week became the second major developed-world central bank to cut interest rates.】

item.description: 安联集团（Allianz SE）第一季度利润增长 6.8%，原因是非寿险理赔率低，以及其债券管理公司太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Allianz SE reported 6.8% higher profit for the first quarter amid low claims from non-life insurance and inflows at its bond manager Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 经济学家警告称，澳大利亚财政预算增长可能导致澳大利亚央行更加鹰派
item.description: 经济学家们表示，尽管周二的预算案预测通胀率将在年底前回落至2-3%的目标范围内，但澳大利亚央行很可能会在更长时间内维持利率高位，而这一结果通常会为更早的宽松政策敞开大门。【原文：Australia’s central bank is likely to keep interest rates elevated for longer, economists said, despite Tuesday’s budget forecasting inflation to fall back within the 2-3% target by year’s end, a result that would normally open the door to earlier easing.】

item.title: 俄罗斯的乌克兰战争增加了欧盟东部的借贷成本
item.description: 根据欧洲复兴开发银行的分析，俄罗斯入侵乌克兰打击了欧盟东部 10 个成员国的主权借贷成本，自战争开始以来，借贷成本提高了约半个百分点。【原文：Russia’s invasion of Ukraine has hit sovereign borrowing costs for the EU’s 10 eastern members, raising the cost by around half a percentage point since the war began, according to an analysis by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.】

item.title: 押注美国通胀放缓，世界股市再创新高
item.description: 美国通胀报告可能为美联储的加息路径提供线索，在该报告公布之前，全球股市升至历史新高。【原文：Global equities rose to a record high ahead of a US inflation report that may offer clues on the Federal Reserve’s interest rate path.】

item.title: 全球基金押注印度期限较长的债券
item.description: 全球基金正在抢购印度的较长期限债券，以赌印度央行最终会变得不那么鹰派，同时他们也在为那些将被纳入摩根大通公司指数的证券做准备。【原文：Global funds are snapping up India’s longer-maturity bonds in a bet the central bank will eventually become less hawkish and as they position for those securities that will be included in JPMorgan Chase & Co. indexes.】

item.title: 新加坡房屋销售因项目需求疲软而下降
item.description: 新加坡的新房销售量在短暂飙升后出现下滑，表明该国一度繁荣的房地产市场情绪脆弱。【原文：Sales of new homes in Singapore fell after a brief surge, in a sign of fragile sentiment in the nation’s once-booming property market.】

item.title: 印度最大的影院运营商希望放映 T20 板球世界杯，因为电影令人失望
item.description: 在电影票房持续低迷的情况下，印度最大的影院运营商正在讨论在国际板球理事会男子 T20 世界杯期间放映重要比赛，以吸引观众。【原文：India’s largest cinema operator is in discussions to screen key matches during the International Cricket Council Men’s T20 World Cup, in a bid to lure patrons as movies continue to struggle at the box office.】

item.title: 日本央行本周意外削减购债规模，引发加息押注
item.description: 日本央行在本周的例行操作中意外减少了债券购买量，投资者因此加大了对日本央行在 7 月前加息的押注。【原文：Investors have boosted bets for an interest-rate hike by the Bank of Japan by July following an unexpected reduction in its bond buying during a regular operation this week.】

item.description:
马克龙的宏伟计划和对肖尔茨的嘲讽掩盖了一个事实：在法国原地踏步之际，柏林正在加紧参与乌克兰事务。【原文：

Macron’s grand plans and jabs at Scholz obscure the fact that Berlin is stepping up its engagement for Ukraine as France stands still.

item.title: 美国通胀数据显示美联储向正确方向迈出一小步
item.description: 预测人员预计，美国消费者物价月度报告将显示，通胀压力在今年年初连续三次低于预期之后，在 4 月份有所缓和。【原文：Forecasters expect a monthly report on US consumer prices to show inflationary pressures moderated in April after three straight worse-than-anticipated readings to start the year.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Khazanah和EPF正考虑将马来西亚机场私有化
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马来西亚主权财富基金和公共养老金提供商正在考虑将马来西亚机场控股有限公司（Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd.【原文：Malaysia’s sovereign wealth fund and public pension provider are considering taking Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd. private, according to people familiar with the matter, as trading in the airport operator was suspended Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国考虑由政府购买未售出房屋以缓解供应过剩问题
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正在考虑一项提案，让全国各地的地方政府购买数百万套未售出的住房，这将是中国为挽救陷入困境的房地产市场而做出的最雄心勃勃的尝试之一。【原文：China is considering a proposal to have local governments across the country buy millions of unsold homes, people familiar with the matter said, in what would be one of its most ambitious attempts yet to salvage the beleaguered property market.】

item.title: 世界铝价飙升，中国进口俄罗斯铝暂时受阻
item.description: 中国买家暂时回避俄罗斯铝，因为商业现实阻碍了双边贸易关系的深化。【原文：Chinese buyers are temporarily shunning Russian aluminum, as commercial realities intrude on the push to deepen bilateral trade ties.】

item.title: 中国人民银行推出政策性贷款，关注经济增长和货币问题
item.description: 中国央行以相同的借贷成本延长了关键政策贷款的期限，这表明央行有意在不增加人民币压力的情况下帮助刚刚起步的经济复苏。【原文：China’s central bank extended a key policy loan at the same borrowing cost, signaling an intention to aid a nascent economic recovery without adding pressure on the yuan.】

item.title: 美联储施密德称利率可能在 "一段时间 "内保持高位
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰弗里-施密德（Jeffrey Schmid）表示，利率可能会在 "一段时间内 "保持高位，因为政策制定者正在等待物价压力正在缓解的证据。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeffrey Schmid said interest rates could remain high “for some time” as policymakers await evidence that price pressures are easing.】

item.title: 索尼业绩超预期并回购股票，股价最高上涨 10
item.description: 在《圣斗士星矢 2》等游戏的帮助下，索尼集团 3 月份季度净利润超过预期，股价创下约 18 个月以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Sony Group Corp.’s stock surged its most in about 18 months after games like Helldivers 2 helped lift net income past estimates during the March quarter.】
